Package game.runes

Class RunesManager

java.lang.Object
game.runes.RunesManager
public class RunesManager extends Object
A class that represents the runes manager in the game. It is a singleton class that only has one instance of runes manager. Runes manager is responsible for keeping track of the amount of runes the actor has.
Author:
Zhi Hui Tee
